member.name: M:DevkitApi.Controllers.DevkitsController.GetDevkit(System.Int32)
member.summary: Returns a Devkit with the specificed id
member.returns: Returns a Devkit with the specificed id if it exists. If it does not exist it returns empty. If id is not an int it returns Bad request.
member.response: Returns a Devkit with the specificed id
Returns bad request if the id is not an int.

member.name: M:DevkitApi.Controllers.DevkitsController.PutDevkit(System.Int32,DevkitApi.Model.Devkit)
member.summary: Updates the Devkit with the specificed id. Returns no content
member.returns: Returns empty if the Devkit with the specificed id exist and is updated. If it does not exist it returns Bad request response. If id is not an int or if the id for the Devkit is different from the id it returns Bad request.
member.response: Returns a the tools for the Devkit with the specificed id
Returns bad request if the id is not an int or if the id does not match the Devkit id in the body.

member.name: M:DevkitApi.Controllers.DevkitsController.PostDevkit(DevkitApi.Model.Devkit)
member.summary: Create a new Devkit Returns the Devkit
member.returns: Returns the Devkit. If the Devkit in the request is malfomed it returns Bad request response.
member.response: The Devkit was created and the Devkit returned
Returns bad request if the Devkit is malfomed.

member.name: M:DevkitApi.Controllers.DevkitsController.GetToolsForKit(System.Int32)
member.summary: Returns the tools for a Devkit with the specificed id
member.returns: Returns the tools for a Devkit with the specificed id if it exist. If it does not exist it returns empty. If id is not an int it returns Bad request.
member.response: Returns a the tools for the Devkit with the specificed id
Returns bad request if the id is not an int.
